00025 #ifndef _BASE_EXPRESSION_
00026 #define _BASE_EXPRESSION_
00027 
00028 #include <base/base>
00029 #include <base/ExpressionNode>
00030 #include <base/Object>
00031 #include <base/ReferencedObject>
00032 #include <base/Vector>
00033 
00034 #include <mtl/mtl.h>
00035 
00036 
00037 namespace base {
00038 
00039 //
00040 // An expression that can be evaluated with a parameter Vector
00041 //  and differentiated. Has value semantics.
00042 //  (represented as an ExpressionNode tree)
00043 
00044 class Expression : public Object
00045 {
00046 public:
00047   Expression();
00048   Expression(Real constant);
00049   Expression(const Expression& e);
00050 
00051   virtual String className() const { return String("Expression"); }
00052 
00053   Real       evaluate(const Vector& params) const;
00054   Expression differentiate( Expression withRespectTo ) const;
00055 
00056   void simplify(); 
00057   void operationCounts(Int& addsub, Int& multdiv, Int& trig) const; 
00058 
00059   String toString() const;
00060 
00061   struct VariableIndexer { Expression operator[](Int i) const; };
00062 
00063   static VariableIndexer p; 
00064 
00065   Expression& operator=(const Expression& e) { expr = e.expr; return *this; }
00066   Expression& operator+=(const Expression& e);
00067   Expression& operator-=(const Expression& e);
00068   Expression& operator*=(const Expression& e);
00069   Expression& operator/=(const Expression& e);
00070   Expression& negate();
00071   Expression& sin();
00072   Expression& cos();
00073 
00074   friend class VariableIndexer;
00075 
00076 protected:
00077   Expression(ref<ExpressionNode> expr)
00078     : expr(expr) {}
00079 
00080   ref<ExpressionNode> expr; 
00081 
00082   // Simplification helper methods
00083   ref<ExpressionNode> simplifyConstantExpressions(ref<ExpressionNode> expr); 
00084 };
00085 
00086 
00087 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const Expression& e) // Output
00088 { return (out << e.toString()); }
00089 
00090 
00091 
00092 // function operators/operations
00093 inline Expression operator+(const Expression& lhs, const Expression& rhs)
00094 { Expression r(lhs); r+= rhs; return r; }
00095 
00096 inline Expression operator-(const Expression& lhs, const Expression& rhs)
00097 { Expression r(lhs); r-= rhs; return r; }
00098 
00099 inline Expression operator*(const Expression& lhs, const Expression& rhs)
00100 { Expression r(lhs); r*= rhs; return r; }
00101 
00102 inline Expression operator/(const Expression& lhs, const Expression& rhs)
00103 { Expression r(lhs); r/= rhs; return r; }
00104 
00105 inline Expression operator-(const Expression& e)
00106 { Expression r(e); r.negate(); return r; }
00107 
00108 inline Expression sin(const Expression& angle)
00109 { Expression r(angle); r.sin(); return r; }
00110 
00111 inline Expression cos(const Expression& angle)
00112 { Expression r(angle); r.cos(); return r; }
00113 
00114 
00115 //... etc.
00116 
00117 
00118 
00119 // A Matrix|Vector of Expressions
00120 typedef mtl::matrix<Expression, mtl::rectangle<>, mtl::array<mtl::dense<> >, mtl::row_major>::type ExpressionMatrix;
00121 typedef mtl::dense1D<Expression> ExpressionVector;
00122 
00123 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const ExpressionMatrix& m) // Output
00124 { 
00125   for(Int r=0; r<m.nrows(); r++) {
00126     for(Int c=0; c<m.ncols(); c++) {
00127       out << m(r,c) << " ";
00128     }
00129     out << "\n";
00130   }
00131   return out;
00132 }
00133 
00134 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const ExpressionVector& v) // Output
00135 { 
00136   out << "[";
00137   for(Int i=0; i<v.size(); i++)
00138     out << v[i] << ((i!=v.size()-1)?",":"]");
00139   return out;
00140 }
00141 
00142 inline void base::simplify( ExpressionMatrix m ) {
00143   for ( Int r=0; r < m.nrows(); r++ ) {
00144     for ( Int c=0; c < m.ncols(); c++ ) {
00145       m(r,c).simplify();
00146     }
00147   }
00148   return;
00149 }
00150 
00151 } // base
00152 
00153 #endif
